>
[Ghoran Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=3958) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 39</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ghoran Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=3947)

</column>

---

It's as if you've been training for a thousand years. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the [glaive](/Weapons.aspx?ID=20), [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22), [hatchet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), [sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9), and [ghoran](/Traits.aspx?ID=352) weapons in which you're trained.
